name: Sigma-V
description:
STORY:

The year is 200X. The President of the United States of America has just received a report on terrorist activities from a group known as Antimatter. In it showed plans to attack the United States with an army of mechs. It was then that a new battalion of specially made robots were created, Sigma-V.

CONTROLS:ASwitch Mech/Tool SelectionBPlace Mech/Use Tool of Selection MECHS:COST:ABILITIES:Cycle1Attacks enemies in a line down.Turret2Shoots weaving bullets downwards.Spread4Shoots three bullets at once.Squad7Shoots in four directions at once. TOOLS:COST:USAGE:Delete0Deletes a mech.Bullet10Shoots a bullet downwards.

Control Map Help:

Z - B

X - A

Arrow Keys - Directional Pad

Enter - Start

Shift - Select
